en.title: Creating a Safe Room for Your Kitten | 10 Checks to Prevent Hazards
en.content:
Curious kittens will try to chew on anything and squeeze into tight spaces. Creating a safe room is essential to prevent accidents.

10 Safety Checks

☐ Cover electrical cords (to prevent electric shock and chewing through wires)
☐ Put away small items such as hair ties, buttons, and strings (to prevent accidental ingestion)
☐ Remove toxic plants (lily family plants are especially dangerous)
☐ Install window stoppers (to prevent falls)
☐ Close the bathtub lid (to prevent drowning)
☐ Check inside the washing machine and dryer before use
☐ Put lids on trash cans
☐ Block narrow gaps (behind furniture, etc.)
☐ Store medicine and detergents out of the cat's reach
☐ Be careful with heat sources such as irons and heaters

zh.title: 为小猫打造安全的房间 | 防止危险的10项检查
zh.content:
好奇心旺盛的小猫会把什么都往嘴里放，还会钻进狭窄的地方。做好房间安全防护对预防事故至关重要。

10项安全检查

☐ 给电线套上保护套（防止触电和咬断电线）
☐ 收好小物件，如发圈、纽扣、绳子等（防止误食）
☐ 不要摆放有毒植物（百合科植物尤其危险）
☐ 在窗户上安装限位器（防止坠落）
☐ 盖好浴缸盖（防止溺水）
☐ 使用洗衣机和烘干机前先检查里面
☐ 给垃圾桶加盖
☐ 封堵狭窄缝隙（家具后面等）
☐ 将药品和洗涤剂放在猫够不到的地方
☐ 注意熨斗、暖炉等热源
